bibl.title: Multitextuality in the Homeric Iliad. The Witness of the Ptolemaic Papyri. (Hellenic Studies. 43.)
bibl.note: 1. Textual Criticism as Applied to Classical and Biblical Texts. - 2. Homer and Textual Criticism. - 3. The Ptolemaic Papyri of the Iliad: Evidence of Eccentricity or Multitextuality? - Appendix A: Other Instances of Multitextuality; - Appendix B: Glossary of Terms. - Bibliography. Index.
BIRD Graeme D., Multitextuality in the Homeric Iliad. The Witness of the Ptolemaic Papyri. (Hellenic Studies. 43.)
Washington, D.C., Center for Hellenic Studies - Cambridge, Mass. - London (Diffusion: Harvard University Press), 2010, 8Â°, 119 pp., tabl., 3 diagrammes, 4 figg. ISBN 978-0-674-05323-6. $19.95.
